doc:
Isabel Sanford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Isabel_Sanford 0 Isabel Sanford (born Eloise Gwendolyn Sanford; August 29, 1917 – July 9, 2004) was an American stage, film, and television actress and comedian best known for her role as Louise "Weezy" Mills Jefferson on the CBS sitcoms All in the Family (1971–1975) and The Jeffersons (1975–1985). In 1981, she became the second black American actress to win a Primetime Emmy Award, and the first to win for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series. Isabel_Sanford ( born Eloise_Gwendolyn_Sanford ; August_29_,_1917 – July_9_,_2004 ) was an_American_stage , film , and television_actress_and_comedian best_known for her_role as Louise_"_Weezy_"_Mills_Jefferson on the_CBS sitcoms All in the_Family ( 1971 – 1975 ) and The_Jeffersons ( 1975 – 1985 ) . In 1981 , she became the_second_black_American_actress to_win a_Primetime_Emmy_Award , and the_first to_win for Outstanding_Lead_Actress in a_Comedy_Series .
